mapper.sql: ID, DOCUMENT_ID, TITLE, CLIENT_ID, CORPORATE_NAME, UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, REVIEW_DATE, CURRENT_STATUS, CURRENT_OPERATOR, CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME, CREATED_DATETIME, CREATED_BY, WORK_PHONE, PHONE, SECURITY_LEVEL, SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL, URGENCY_LEVEL, URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON, BPM_DOC_NO, END_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from COUNTERPARTY_PROD_MONITOR_FLOW
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into COUNTERPARTY_PROD_MONITOR_FLOW (ID, DOCUMENT_ID, TITLE, CLIENT_ID, CORPORATE_NAME, UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, REVIEW_DATE, CURRENT_STATUS, CURRENT_OPERATOR, CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME, CREATED_DATETIME, CREATED_BY, WORK_PHONE, PHONE, SECURITY_LEVEL, SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL, URGENCY_LEVEL, URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON, BPM_DOC_NO, END_DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unifiedsocialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityLevelDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgencyLevelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bpmDocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COUNTERPARTY_PROD_MONITOR_FLOW WHERE CURRENT_STATUS !='CLOSED' AND CORPORATE_NAME = #{CorporateName ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update COUNTERPARTY_PROD_MONITOR_FLOW
DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CORPORATE_NAME = #{corporateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE = #{unifiedsocialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVIEW_DATE = #{reviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CURRENT_STATUS = #{currentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_OPERATOR = #{currentOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME = #{currentActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATETIME = #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_PHONE = #{workPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECURITY_LEVEL = #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL = #{securityLevelDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URGENCY_LEVEL = #{urgencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON = #{urgencyLevelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BPM_DOC_NO = #{bpmDocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update COUNTERPARTY_PROD_MONITOR_FLOW set DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPORATE_NAME = #{corporateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIFIEDSOCIAL_CODE = #{unifiedsocialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REVIEW_DATE = #{reviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENT_STATUS = #{currentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_OPERATOR = #{currentOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_ACTIVITY_NAME = #{currentActivityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DATETIME = #{createdDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_PHONE = #{workPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_LEVEL = #{securityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_LEVEL_DETAIL = #{securityLevelDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URGENCY_LEVEL = #{urgencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URGENCY_LEVEL_REASON = #{urgencyLevelReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BPM_DOC_NO = #{bpmDocNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
